name: Incognito
description:
'''Incognito''' is a British [[acid jazz]] band based in London. Their debut album, ''Jazz Funk'', was released in 1981.

[[Jean-Paul 'Bluey' Maunick]] is the band's frontman, singer, guitarist, composer, and record producer. The band has now included Linda Muriel, [[Jocelyn Brown]], [[Maysa Leak]], [[Tony Momrelle]], [[Imaani|Imaani Saleem]], Vanessa Haynes, Mo Brandis, Natalie Williams, [[Carleen Anderson]], Pamela "PY" Anderson, Kelli Sae, and Joy Malcolm.
